title: MESSAGE SYSTEM DOCUMENTATION
message:
This file controls the remote messaging system. 

REQUIRED FIELDS:
- id: Unique string identifier
- type: 'content' | 'info' | 'warning' | 'success' | 'announcement' | 'update' | 'critical'
- title: Message title
- message: Message body text
- startDate: ISO 8601 date (e.g. '2024-01-01T00:00:00Z')
- dismissible: boolean

OPTIONAL FIELDS:
- endDate: ISO 8601 date (message expires after this)
- priority: number (higher shows first)
- link: { text: string, url: string, type: 'external'|'internal' }
- targetVersion: Semver string (e.g. '>=1.5.0')
- platform: 'ios' | 'android' | 'any'
- icon: MaterialIcon name

NOTE: This documentation item is hidden via startDate='2099...'
